text: Nenad Šarić Brada (10 October 1947 in Rijeka, Yugoslavia - 3 May 2012 in Karlovac, Croatia) was a Croatian musician, best known as the drummer of Novi Fosili. == Biography == Šarić began with music from elementary school and became a drummer with Jutarnje zvijezde (Morning stars).Stranica o Nenadu Šariću na web-stranici Croatia recordsa Preuzeto 4. svibnja 2012. Until 1985, he performed with Oliver Dragojević among others. ==Death== Šarić died in 3 May 2012, aged 65, from complications of a stroke.Vijest o smrti Nenada Šarića u Večernjem listu Preuzeto 4. svibnja 2012.Vijest o smrti Nenada Šarića na web-stranici Dnevnika == Marriage == For almost 20 years, he was married to Sanja Doležal, lead singer of the group Novi Fosili. == See also == *Novi fosili *Sanja Doležal == Sources == Category:1947 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Musicians from Rijeka Category:Yugoslav musicians Category:Croatian musicians
title: Nenad Šarić
